product_name: Shimano XT RD-M781 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur
long_description: Featuring an optional direct mount for compatible bikes, the Shimano XT RD-M781 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur delivers mountain-ready toughness, responsive shifting and a low-profile design.
short_description: Featuring an optional direct mount for compatible bikes, the Shimano XT RD-M781 SGS 10-Speed Rear Derailleur delivers mountain-ready toughness, responsive shifting and a low-profile design.
